comment: A grid of Chinese characters in seal script, with phonetic annotations (cutting marks) in smaller regular script to the right of each character. The characters are arranged in vertical columns from right to left, typical of traditional Chinese texts. The outer border is a thick black frame. In the upper-left corner, there is a small vertical label reading '大五十二' (Dà Wǔshí'èr), likely indicating a page or section number. At the bottom-left corner, the name '程樹' (Chéng Shù) appears, possibly the author or engraver. The paper shows signs of age, with slight discoloration and ink bleed along the left margin.
